concept.title: Architectural specification: Technical content edition
concept.shortdesc: The architectural specification portion of the DITA specification outlines the framework of DITA. It contains an overview of DITA markup; addressing; processing; configuration, specialization, generalization, and constraints; as well as information about coding DITA grammar files.

conbody.p: The technical content edition also contains information about the techical-content document types and domains, as well as a topic that provides an overview of the DITA elements that support documenting troubleshooting information.
